newsitem.title: FRANCE: Bulgaria wheat import tender imminent-Euro traders.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria wheat import tender imminent-Euro traders.

text.p: European grain traders said on Thursday they expected Bulgaria to launch a tender later in the day for the purchase of 75,000 tonnes of soft wheat for spot delivery.
"Bulgaria urgently needs to buy 75,000 tonnes of wheat to finish the season. It is expected to launch the tender today," one exporter said
On May 20 farm ministry officials said Bulgaria needed to import 75,000 tonnes of wheat to cover the gap until the next harvest but did not provide a date for the tender.
